amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes technical and conforming changes to the reported text of H.R. 8, H.R. 2295 and H.R. 2358.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 1 printed in House report 114-359 to strike a number of provisions, some of which have already been enacted into law and to make technical and conforming changes to the reported text of H.R. 8, H.R. 2295 and H.R. 2358.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Upton amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 177 (Roll no. 656).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Upton amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 177 (Roll no. 656).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Upton.
